佅字的基本解释

佅
mài
中国少数民族的一种乐曲。

佅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mài］
［《廣韻》莫話切，去夬，明。］
我国古代东方少数民族乐名。

佅字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佅； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页97第20
【廣韻】莫話切【集韻】莫敗切，?音賣。樂名。【班固·東都賦】僸佅兜離。【禮·明堂位】作昧。【周禮】作?，義同。

考證：〔【廣韻】莫話切，【集韻】莫敗切，?音賣。藥名。〕　謹照東都賦註，藥名改樂名。
佅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
佅字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Quack
mài
A kind of music of Chinese ethnic minorities.
Quack
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mài］
["Guang Yun" don't cut the words, go to 夬, Ming. ]
Musical names of ethnic minorities in the east in ancient my country.
Quack
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　佅; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 97-20
[Guang Yun] Do not cut the words [Ji Yun] Do not lose, and sell it with sound. Music name. 【Banggu·Dongdu Fu】僸佅都里. 【Rite·Ming Hall】Be ignorant. [Zhou Li] For?, the meaning is the same. Textual research: [[Guangyun] Don’t cut your words, [Jiyun] Don’t lose your words, sell it in sound. The name of the medicine. 〕 　 I would like to follow the Dongdu Fu, and the name of the medicine was changed to Le.
